construct.summary: Initializes a class instance with the provided values.

Add.summary: Creates an object and adds it to the collection.

AddObject.summary: Adds an object and key value.

Get.summary: Get the item by Key value.
Get.param: Indicates if an error should be thrown.

IsInValue.summary: Determines if a delimiter is in a text value.
IsInValue.returns: True if the index is in a range, otherwise false.

SetRanges.summary: Sets value ranges and returns true if a range was defined.
SetRanges.returns: True if there are ranges, otherwise false.

SplitRanges.summary: Splits a line of text on the delimiters not enclosed in a value.

RemoveLeadingBlanks.summary: Removes only the leading blanks not other whitespace.
